user.title: Birthday Tracker
user.description:
Track friends' and family birthdays, display them on a calendar, and get configurable reminder events for your automations.

Click Submit to set up.

data.default_reminder_days: Default reminder days before birthday (comma-separated, e.g. 7,1,0)

error.invalid_days: Invalid format. Use comma-separated positive numbers (e.g. 7,1,0).

add_birthday.name: Add Birthday
add_birthday.description: Add a new birthday to track.

date.name: Date
date.description: Birthday date in YYYY-MM-DD format (or MM-DD if birth year is unknown).

reminder_days_before.name: Reminder Days Before
reminder_days_before.description: Comma-separated days before birthday to send reminders (e.g. 7,1,0). Uses global default if omitted.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional notes such as gift ideas.

remove_birthday.name: Remove Birthday
remove_birthday.description: Remove a tracked birthday by its ID.

id.name: Birthday ID
id.description: The unique ID of the birthday to remove. Use the list_birthdays service to find IDs.

edit_birthday.name: Edit Birthday
edit_birthday.description: Edit an existing tracked birthday. Only provided fields will be updated.

id.name: Birthday ID
id.description: The unique ID of the birthday to edit.

list_birthdays.name: List Birthdays
list_birthdays.description: List all tracked birthdays sorted by days until next occurrence. Returns response data with age and countdown information.
